Class Elipse

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shapes
      • TwoDimensionalShape
        • Elipse
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle

    public class Elipse
extends TwoDimensionalShape
    The class Elipse contains all required variables and methods to compute information about itself as well as it's child-classes. It extends TwoDimensionalShapes as it shares traits (such as having no volume or surface area) as other TwoDimensionalShapes.
    Author:
    Kyle Dorcey

    • Constructor Detail

      • Elipse

        public Elipse(java.lang.String shapeName,
              double firstRadius,
              double secondRadius)
        Class constructor for Elipse. Passes shapeName to it's parent class. Checks first and second radius to determine which is larger and should be saved as bigRadius or smallRadius.
        Parameters:
        shapeName - String containing the user selected shape name.
        firstRadius - One radius of the elipse.
        secondRadius - Second radius of the elipse.

      • Elipse

        public Elipse(java.lang.String shapeName,
              double firstRadius)
        Overload version of the Elipse constructor used primarily for when an elipse is actually a circle.
        Parameters:
        shapeName - String containing the user selected shape name.
        firstRadius - radius of the elipse/circle.

    • Method Detail

      • findPerimeter

        private static double findPerimeter(double bigRadius,
                                    double smallRadius)
        Finds the circumference of the elipse. Method is static so it can be called during class construction. Due to the nature of elipses the perimeter can only be accurate within 5% using this method.
        Parameters:
        bigRadius - Double with the size of the largest radius of the elipse
        smallRadius - Double with the smaller radius of the elipse
        Returns:
        Returns the circumference of the elipse as a double.

      • findArea

        private static double findArea(double bigRadius,
                               double smallRadius)
        Finds the area of an elipse. Method is static so it can be called during class construction.
        Parameters:
        bigRadius - Double with the size of the largest radius of the elipse
        smallRadius - Double with the smaller radius of the elipse
        Returns:
        returns the area of a circle as a double.

      • getPerimeter

        public double getPerimeter()
        Returns:
